select * from account_book as ab inner join category as ct on ab.ctno=ct.ctno

update account_book as ab inner join category as c on on ab.ctno=c.ctno set abno=#{abno},ab_inout=#{ab_inout},ab_date=#{ab_date},ab_content=#{ab_content},ab_method=#{ab_method},ab_memo=#{ab_memo},ct_top=#{ct_top},ct_bottom=#{ct_top}

select ct.ct_top ct_top, p_amount from plan p inner join category ct on p.ctno=ct.ctno
group by ct.ct_top;
